com.dhchoi

Class CountdownTimerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhchoi.CountdownTimerService

  • public class CountdownTimerService
extends Object
    The service class that manages the creation and removal of all CountdownTimers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CountdownTimer getCountdownTimerForId(int id)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getNewCountdownTimer

        public static CountdownTimer getNewCountdownTimer(PApplet app)
        Returns a new CountdownTimer that can be used inside the main Processing applet. The first created CountdownTimer will always have an id of 0. All subsequently created CountdownTimers will have an id that is one higher than the previously created CountdownTimer's id. (e.g. second created timer will have id 1, third created timer will have id 2, and so on)
        Parameters:
        app - the main Processing applet
        Returns:
        a newly created CountdownTimer

      • getCountdownTimerForId

        public static CountdownTimer getCountdownTimerForId(int id)
        Returns the CountdownTimer associated with the corresponding id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the desired CountdownTimer
        Returns:
        the CountdownTimer associated with the corresponding id

      • getTimerIds

        public static HashSet<Integer> getTimerIds()
        Returns a set of CountdownTimer ids that have been created.
        Returns:
        a set of CountdownTimer ids that have been created

      • removeCountdownTimer

        public static boolean removeCountdownTimer(CountdownTimer timer)
        Removes a CountdownTimer from the created set of CountdownTimers. If the CountdownTimer is still running, the CountdownTimer will not be removed.
        Parameters:
        timer - the intended CountdownTimer to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the CountdownTimer was successfully removed

      • removeCountdownTimerWithId

        public static boolean removeCountdownTimerWithId(int id)
        Removes a CountdownTimer with the corresponding id from the created set of CountdownTimers. If the CountdownTimer is still running, the CountdownTimer will not be removed.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the intended CountdownTimer to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the CountdownTimer was successfully removed
